metadata.name: P3TX SERUM
metadata.description:
The mysterious P3TX Serums discovered in a covert lab. Inside the vials is a secret formula harvested from meteorites containing a mystical cosmic energy. They have no effect on humans, but exposure to your IVY PETS will give them new enhanced abilities. One serum is potent enough to transform any pet into a SUPER PET and Five will supe one into a powerful MEGA PET. IVY PETS from around the world must step up, for the fates of Good and Bad lie in their paws.

Welcome to the World of IVY PETS! Season 2 of IVY BOYS by Aaron Chang brings along a new collection of art reimagined into the perfect little companions to your IVY BOYS & GIRLS. This marks the continuation of the second phase of our adventure as we expand into the IVY UNIVERSE. Season 2 also presents IVY ATHLETICS where IVY BOYS and IVY PETS can compete and stake to win prizes. Visit BBRC.io for more details or to administer P3TX Serums to IVY PETS. Visit BBRC.io for more information.
